short_summary: The Canadian Energy Regulator is looking for professional services for IT transformation and business architecture.
description: The procurement process is related to the services needed to support IT transformation and business architecture activities. The project focuses on delivering business process improvements and transforming the structure of the organization.

full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement

**Title**: Invitation to Bid (ITB) - [84084-22-0120]

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01022539
**Publication Date**: January 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 6, 2023, at 4:00 PM (Mountain Standard Time)

**Purpose**: The Canadian Energy Regulator (CER) is seeking proposals from qualified vendors to provide Business Architecture and Business Transformation services to support the increasing volume of business transformation activities.

**Scope**:

* Provide expertise to execute transformation projects and oversee critical deliverables
* Develop and implement business strategies that enhance end-to-end business streamlining and workflow efficiencies
* Develop robust and efficient Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) business strategies to address future needs

**Key Tendering Information**:
- Tendering method: Competitive - Selective tendering
- Procurement category: SRV (Services)
- Notice type: Request for Proposal
- Contract category: None
- Trade agreements: May be subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement

**Eligibility**: Vendors interested in this opportunity must possess expertise in Business Architecture and Business Transformation, with strong knowledge of IT systems and information management. Vendors should also have relevant experience in providing similar services to government or large-scale enterprises.

**Evaluation Criteria**: Proposals will be evaluated based on the vendor's experience and expertise, the quality and feasibility of the proposal, and the vendor's overall ability to meet the scope of work.

**How to Respond**: Interested vendors should submit their proposals electronically to [Shirley Rehel, 403-919-8444, Shirley.Rehel@cer-rec.gc.ca](mailto:Shirley.Rehel@cer-rec.gc.ca).

**Attachments**: Notice of Proposed Procurement documents can be accessed at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Processing Instructions**: Vendors responding to this ITB should clearly denote their proposal as ITB [84084-22-0120] and indicate the region in which they operate to meet the scope of this project.

**Important**: The CER reserves the right to cancel this ITB at any time, and to reject any or all responses.

**Submission Deadlines**: Submissions will not be accepted after February 6, 2023, at 4:00 PM (Mountain Standard Time).
